```{r}
# Load necessary packages
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

# Set working directory
setwd("C:\\Users\\owenf\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\NHL Analytics")

# Load CSV files containing player data and team data
player <- read.csv("./player_stats.csv") #C:\\Users\\owenf\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\NHL Analytics\\
team <- read.csv("./team_stats.csv")
```

```{r}
# Arrange team data table so that the order of which team is listed lines up with order for players
team <- team %>%
  arrange(Year) %>%
  mutate(ID = paste0(Team, Year)) #ID: unique id for each team with name and year

# Group by team and year and create a vector containing data values for each player
groups <- player %>%
  group_by(Year, Team)
teams <- group_split(groups)
```

```{r}
require(data.table)

# Create empty list
full_stats <- list()

# Fill each list index with the player stats for one team, lining on with row number of the same team in team data table
for (i in 1:303){
  full_stats[[i]] <- setDT(teams[[i]])[setDT(team[i,]), on=c("Team", "Year")]
}
```

```{r}
# Add variables to change some stats to per game
for (i in 1:303){
  full_stats[[i]] <- full_stats[[i]] %>%
    mutate(GP_pct = GP/i.GP, #GP: games played
         G_perGame = G/GP, #G: goals
         A_perGame = A/GP, #A: assists
         PTS_perGame = PTS/GP, #PTS: points
         S_perGame = S/GP, #S: shots
         OPS_perGame = OPS/GP, #OPS: offensive point shares
         DPS_perGame = DPS/GP, #DPS: defensive point shares
         PS_perGame = PS/GP, #PS: point shares
         BLK_perGame = BLK/GP, #BLK: blocks
         HIT_perGame = HIT/GP, #HIT: hits
         TOI_perGame = TOI/GP, #TOI: time on ice
         
         # Create position variable to generalize each player into forward, defense, goalie
         Position = if_else(Pos=="G", "G", 
                            if_else(Pos=="D", "D",
                                    if_else(Pos=="C", "F",
                                            if_else(Pos=="RW", "F",
                                                    if_else(Pos=="LW", "F",
                                                            if_else(Pos=="W", "F", "NAN")))))))
}
```

```{r}
# Create forwards and defensemen lists that filter out just players at that position from the team in full_stats
# Players must have appeared in at least 25% of the team's games to be included in the data

forwards <- list()
defensemen <- list()

for (i in 1:303){
  forwards[[i]] <- full_stats[[i]] %>%
    filter(GP_pct >= 0.25, Position == "F") %>%
    arrange(desc(TOI_perGame)) # Order forwards by time on ice from highest to lowest
  
  defensemen[[i]] <- full_stats[[i]] %>%
    filter(GP_pct >= 0.25, Position == "D") %>%
    arrange(desc(TOI_perGame)) # Order defensemen by time on ice from highest to lowest
  
  team$num_F[i] <- nrow(forwards[[i]])
  team$num_D[i] <- nrow(defensemen[[i]])
}
```

```{r}
# Create new variables in team table, for average statistic values among players in groups
# Groups determined by their ranking of most time on ice per game

for (i in 1:303){
  f <- list()
  
  # Stats for each individual forward
  for (j in c(1:12)){
    f[[j]] <- forwards[[i]] %>%
      slice(j)
  
    team[[paste0("GP_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$GP)
    team[[paste0("G_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$G_perGame)
    team[[paste0("PTS_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$PTS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("Shots_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$S_perGame)
    team[[paste0("PS_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$PS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("OPS_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$OPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("DPS_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$DPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("BLK_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$BLK_perGame)
    team[[paste0("HIT_F_",j)]][i] <- mean(f[[j]]$HIT_perGame)
  }
  
  # Average stats for forward groups of two
  for (k in c(1,3,5,7,9,11)){
    f[[k]] <- forwards[[i]] %>%
      slice(k:(k+1))
  
    team[[paste0("avgGP_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$GP)
    team[[paste0("avgG_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$G_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgPTS_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$PTS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgShots_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$S_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgPS_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$PS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgOPS_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$OPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgDPS_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$DPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgBLK_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$BLK_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgHIT_F_",k,"-",(k+1))]][i] <- mean(f[[k]]$HIT_perGame)
  }
  
  # Average stats for forward groups of three
  for (m in c(1,4,7,10)){
    f[[m]] <- forwards[[i]] %>%
      slice(m:(m+2))
  
    team[[paste0("avgGP_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$GP)
    team[[paste0("avgG_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$G_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgPTS_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$PTS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgShots_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$S_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgPS_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$PS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgOPS_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$OPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgDPS_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$DPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgBLK_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$BLK_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgHIT_F_",m,"-",(m+2))]][i] <- mean(f[[m]]$HIT_perGame)
  }
  
  # Average stats for forward groups of six
  for (n in c(1,7)){
    f[[n]] <- forwards[[i]] %>%
      slice(n:(n+5))
  
    team[[paste0("avgGP_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$GP)
    team[[paste0("avgG_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$G_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgPTS_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$PTS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgShots_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$S_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgPS_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$PS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgOPS_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$OPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgDPS_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$DPS_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgBLK_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$BLK_perGame)
    team[[paste0("avgHIT_F_",n,"-",(n+5))]][i] <- mean(f[[n]]$HIT_perGame)
  }
}
```
